title: Yuneec’s new Wizard Remote lets you control drones with a wave of your hand
text:
Yuneec’s new Wizard Remote lets you control drones with a wave of your hand 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
To make piloting a drone easier than ever before, the Yuneec has developed a new device called the Typhyoon Wizard -- a controller that allo...
